name: Shellder
flavorText:
Its hard shell
repels any kind
of attack. It is vulnerable
only when its
shell is open.

previous.name: Muk
previous.flavorText:
Thickly covered
with a filthy,
vile sludge. It is so toxic, even
its footprints
contain poison.

next.name: Cloyster
next.flavorText:
When attacked, it
launches its
horns in quick volleys. Its
innards have
never been seen.
